# Adding Locations to Launcher

## Efficiently onboard franchisees onto Launcher to seamlessly oversee the opening process.

### Adding Locations to Launcher

1. Select '+ New Location' and choose 'Launch with Launcher'

![](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-09-09%20at%2010-16-38%E2%80%AFPM-png.png?width=291&height=279&name=Screenshot%202024-09-09%20at%2010-16-38%E2%80%AFPM-png.png)
2. Follow the on-screen instructions to input essential details such as location type, store address, lifecycle stage, and more.
3. After inputting the required information and setting up the store's login, proceed to add Project Details.
1. Select the checklists for the location to complete and any checklists for your internal team to complete. Remember, any internal tasks will only be visible to your team.






      Screen Recording 2024-07-03 at 11.32.52 AM \| HubSpot Video



      ![Screen Recording 2024-07-03 at 11.32.52 AM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/custom-video-thumbnails/Screen%20Recording%202024-07-03%20at%2011.32.52%20AM-thumb.jpeg?length=1920)

2. Include the estimated Go-Live date. Remember, you can change this date at anytime.
3. Add supervisors. (Remember, as superadmins, you are a Supervisor by default).
4. Next step is to add and invite Owners to join Delightree so they may begin using Location Launcher for their new store opening! ðŸŽ‰

_**Explore "Using Location Launcher: A Guide for Franchisors" for more tips!**_

###### Was this article helpful?    YesNo
